alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 30 at 6:46AM CST until November 30 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 800 AM CST. * At 646 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles east of Florala to near Crestview to 13 miles northwest of Wright to near Navarre Beach to near Oriole Beach, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Live Oak, Freeport, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Noma, Black, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Whitehead Crossroads, Villa Tasso and Cerrogordo. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida.
